archimate:DataObject.name: Interim Award
archimate:DataObject.documentation:
Used when student does not complete Primary Target but still gets an award
Business rules determine the interim award based on a combo of number of years of study, number of credits, module passes.
No HEDIPP definition for Interim.
E.g. Cert HE Biomedical Science/Dip HE Biomedical Science/Bsc Biomedical Science = possible interim awards where student hasn't achieved Bsc (hons) Biomedical Science
